Name: The Motorcycle
About the game: A game where a motorcycle is chasing you. Based on a true story. In this game, you need to collect five photos of you before can leave the area. Sounds easy? There is a motorcycle that will chase you, traps, stealth, low budget soundtrack and much more :) For now there is only challenge mode and questionable story mode available, but multiplayer will be added with all maps playable (i guess) :) Singleplayer Story Mode Challenge (Speedrun) Mode Multiplayer (in Progress)
Meta Title: The Motorcycle: Jan 9, 2023, Tobacom and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Motorcycle? Check out the release date (Jan 9, 2023), developer insights from Tobacom, and a complete game summary.
